price: Until when they see what they were promised, they will realize who is weaker in helpers and fewer in number.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
